description: Spoilage rules for inventory items. Forage-only items are spoilable by default.

default_spoilage.description: Default spoilage settings. Base 5% chance per hour for spoilable items.

common.description: Common items spoil at normal rate

u_cold_cellar.description: Cold Cellar upgrade reduces spoilage for fresh ingredients
u_cold_cellar.note: Each level reduces spoilage chance by 1%, up to 50% maximum

fresh.description: Fresh ingredients benefit from cold storage

bowl_spoilage.description: Bowls do not spoil by default. They are pre-cooked and preserved.

overflow_behavior.description: When inventory is full, prevent adding more items (block mode)

ingredients.description: Each ingredient type can stack up to 40 + (5 * u_pantry level)

bowls.description: Each bowl type can stack up to 10 (not modified by upgrades)

catchup_limits.description: When player returns, process up to 24 hours of spoilage (configurable via settings)

exemptions.description: Items that never spoil, regardless of settings

notes: Spoilage only applies to items marked as 'spoilable: true' in bundle.v1.json
Forage-only items are typically spoilable (fresh ingredients)
Market-bought items (broths, noodles) are not spoilable
Spoilage is deterministic based on player ID, item ID, and tick count
Cold Cellar upgrade (u_cold_cellar) reduces spoilage by 50% for fresh items
Tier affects spoilage rate: rarer items spoil more slowly
